name: Invasive Species
description: About twice a year the ElectroAcoustic Ecology Ensemble gathers at selected Los Angeles County-based regional parks to intentionally perform for a non-human audience of geese, herons, and ducks. Sometimes newbie guests arrive and forget to read the agenda which calls for a quiet picnic, gentle jams with portable electronics, as well as setting the human banter as well as any hint of performance to a minimum. The results get collaged into headphone music. The field recorder was armed upon arrival, so could not resist the temptation to include this temporary disruption. An example of EEE headphone music: https://legglake.bandcamp.com/track/thematic-static
